title: Rihanna Accessorized Her Grammys Look With a Flask
text:
Photo: Christopher Polk/Getty Images for NARAS Knowing that she would be in for a long night, Rihanna , a true legend, made sure to bring along a glittery flask to help her get through the Grammys this year. We feel you, Rih.
